== Valat (627300) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Valat is a village in the [[Mananthavady]] taluka of [[Wayanad]] district with an area of 2721 hectares and harbouring 2477 households with total population of 10799 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kalpetta]] is at a distance of 52 km. Male population is 5350 and female population is 5449. Scheduled Caste Population is 62 and Scheduled Tribes population is 2191. Census Location Code of the village is 627300<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
